幽霊とかが実際いるかは知らないけど、「憑かれやすい」って人がいるのは現実の話。

るしあちゃんの「心霊スポットに行かない」という判断は正しい。

author: Nexcell Pride
text:
A worthy gameplay... "Inunaki Tunnel" :_ちょうちょ:
As gameplay is too new, many surprises were present... But game also was a total mystery.

Let's see... It's a puzzle and recording... One part I couldn't understand: the clock at 4:00 a.m. (Or p.m.?)

And Supaachaato Orei Time went too interesting, despite today was too lazy at activity... Maybe it's Saturday and at least Sunday... First January's weekend... New Year celebrations are over... Everyone is resting. :_きゅん:

2:07:23, 2:18:20 and 2:23:31, Personal Marks :_るんるん: Itadakimasu‼️
